div.div: All children must have a way out of thieving, begging or being completely abandoned when they become adults. In addition to helping children as they are growing it is important to give them a path which will help them when adults. Projects should encourages the children to envision their future and professions, to help them providing the education and guidance to allow them achieve their dreams. We encourage projects that provide aplan to children independently of their dreams for after their childhood.
